verses.verse: The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4413>former<s%> <S%G3056>treatise<s%> <S%G3303>have<s%> I <S%G4160>made,<s%> <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G2321>Theophilus,<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>teach,<s%>

Until <S%G891><s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> he was taken <S%G353>up,<s%> after that he <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> had given <S%G1781>commandments<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had chosen: <S%G1586><s%>

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G3936>showed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> after <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3958>passion<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> infallible <S%G5039>proofs,<s%> being <S%G3700>seen<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>speaking<s%> of the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G4012>pertaining<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> being assembled together <S%G4871>with<s%> them, <S%G3853>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> that they should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5563>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> wait <S%G4037>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> which, <S%G3739><s%> saith he, ye have <S%G191>heard<s%> of me. <S%G3450><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> with <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> shall be <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> hence. <S%G5025><s%>

When <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> were come <S%G4905>together,<s%> they <S%G1905>asked<s%> of <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> wilt <S%G1487>thou<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> restore <S%G600>again<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> for <S%G5216>you<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> hath <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> power. <S%G1849><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> ye shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> after that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> is <S%G1904>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> you: <S%G5209><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G4540>Samaria,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the uttermost <S%G2078>part<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> while <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G991>beheld,<s%> he was taken <S%G1869>up;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G5274>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>sight.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>while<s%> they looked <S%G2258>steadfastly<s%> <S%G816><s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> went <S%G4198>up,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2532><s%> stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2066>apparel;<s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Ye <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G1057>Galilee,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> ye gazing <S%G1689>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven?<s%> this <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> which is taken <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> shall <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> in like <S%G3739>manner<s%> <S%G5158><s%> as ye have <S%G2300>seen<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> they <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1638>Olivet,<s%> which <S%G3603>is<s%> <S%G1451>from<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2192>a<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day's<s%> <S%G3598>journey.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they were come <S%G1525>in,<s%> they went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an upper <S%G5253>room,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2258>abode<s%> <S%G2650><s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G918>Bartholomew,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G256>Alphaeus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2208>Zelotes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> the brother of <S%G2385>James.<s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2258>continued<s%> <S%G4342><s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1162>supplication,<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5037>(the<s%> <S%G3793>number<s%> of <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G1909>together<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> a hundred and <S%G1540>twenty,)<s%> <S%G1501><s%>

Men <S%G435><s%> and <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> must <S%G1163>needs<s%> have been <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> spake <S%G4277>before<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> which <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3595>guide<s%> to them that <S%G4815>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2674>numbered<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G2975>obtained<s%> <S%G2819>part<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> this <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2932>purchased<s%> a <S%G5564>field<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> of <S%G93>iniquity;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>falling<s%> <S%G4248>headlong,<s%> he burst <S%G2997>asunder<s%> in the <S%G3319>midst,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4698>bowels<s%> gushed <S%G1632>out.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2730>dwellers<s%> at <S%G2419>Jerusalem;<s%> insomuch <S%G5620>as<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5564>field<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G1258>tongue,<s%> <S%G184>Aceldama,<s%> that is to <S%G5123>say,<s%> The <S%G5564>field<s%> of <S%G129>blood.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G5568>Psalms,<s%> Let <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1886>habitation<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G2048>desolate,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2077>man<s%> <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>therein:<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1984>bishopric<s%> let <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2983>take.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1163>of<s%> these <S%G435>men<s%> which have <S%G4905>companied<s%> with <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1722>that<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%>

Beginning <S%G756><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> that same <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he was taken <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> must <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5130>be<s%> <S%G1096>ordained<s%> to be a <S%G3144>witness<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2476>appointed<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G923>Barsabas,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2459>Justus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4771>Thou,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> which knowest the <S%G2589>hearts<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G322>show<s%> <S%G3739>whether<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> thou hast <S%G1586>chosen,<s%>

That he may <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G2819>part<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship,<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> by transgression <S%G3845>fell,<s%> that he might <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they gave <S%G1325>forth<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2819>lots;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2819>lot<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3159>Matthias;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he was <S%G4785>numbered<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G652>apostles.<s%>
